abstract.para: Even though in most cases &cockpit; is present on &productnameshort; by default, there may be certain cases when &cockpit; is missing. This topic provides instructions on how to install it and enable its service.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: &cockpit; is included in the delivered pre-built images of the default type. In the base type of pre-built images &cockpit; is not installed, so you have to install it.

section.title: &cockpit; plugins
section.para: In the default type of images, &cockpit; contains a full set of plugins. However, depending on technologies installed on your system some plugins may not be visible to you. For example, if NFS is not present, the corresponding NFS pannel is not visible.
